properties.title: Specification of REST Services for OpenUI Document Field Picker

section.name: Specification of REST Services for OpenUI Document Field Picker
section.div: This feature is available since v7.0.0. See Release Notes for detail.

subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: As depicted in Architecture (OpenUI External Document Field Picker) page, the built-in OpenUI Extension Field Picker makes an HTTP GET request on the URL configured by the fineOneUrl Frontend configuration parameter, after replacing the optional id variable in the URL template.

Also, the built-in OpenUI Extension Field Picker Dialog makes an HTTP GET request on the URL configured by the fineAllUrl Frontend configuration parameter, after replacing the optional q variable in the URL template.

subsection.name: JSON Schema of Expected JSON Responses
subsection.p: The built-in OpenUI Extension Field Picker expects an Item JSON object in the response body from the fineOneUrl REST Service.
And it expects an Items JSON array in the response body from the fineAllUrl REST Service.
See the JSON Schema definition for detail below.
